title: Kiru Otoko
episode_desc: Episode of how Kenshin came under the wing of Soujiro Hiko the 13th, how he was trained and how he became a manslayer.
show_desc: In the era of Japan's Meiji Restoration, an assassin regains his humanity.

title: Mayoi Neko
episode_desc: The second episode details Kenshin's role in the revolution, how he met Tomoe, and how the rebellion was almost quelled.
show_desc: In the era of Japan's Meiji Restoration, an assassin regains his humanity.

title: Yoi no Satoyama
episode_desc: The third episode details how Kenshin lived with Tomoe and married her as a cover until his side replenished its forces to continue the rebellion.
show_desc: In the era of Japan's Meiji Restoration, an assassin regains his humanity.

title: Juuji Kizu
episode_desc: The fourth episode is about the betrayal against Kenshin, how he lived for the next few years as a manslayer, and the origin of his cross-shaped scar.
show_desc: In the era of Japan's Meiji Restoration, an assassin regains his humanity.
